1.0.name: wordpress/my-unique-content
1.0.description:
An SEO tool for converting your site's content to your own unique content. This plugin will help you boost your search engine ranking since you will have a fresh and unique content of your site. It has a list of sample of words for you to start and its fully adjustable.

Where can I find more information about the plugin?

Visit My Unique Content here: http://jamesmartinez2011.wordpress.com/
